title: 'Subpar quality
column5: The plastic quality is very poor at this price range, and it's a non returnable product and i have no trust no gala now to implement such policy on the product. High price and low quality products.

title: 'Damaged and Missing Accessories'
body: 'Worst product. Product damaged and missing accessories. Do not recommend'

title: 'Too much waste of water'
body: 'The mob absorbs all the water on in single dip and requires frequent filling of water ..had to fill the bucket often. Waste of water'

title: 'Used it for years'
body: 'I am writing this review after yeaaars of the initial purchase. Whilst a couple of parts of the bucket broke apart in the first year
column5: apart from those weak fittings rest of the bucket and the mop handle itself have lasted long so far.'

title: 'Very useful'
body: It's a very good product.l live in a small Flat.There is very little space to put a mop.So I find this mop convient .It also cleans the floor good.

title: 'Product not justified as per price frankly.'
body: 'Price of product is at a higher side unfortunately there is no other such product with different mop bucket feature however the quality of mop and bucket is good however when it is spinning in water bucket it will for sure face issues as it is not that sturdy plastic material is okay as well I am slightly satisfied however there is lot to improve as per product manufacturing point of view and as per consumer point of view'

title: 'No bottom cap..'
body: 'Eastern side product quality is very bad
column5: . they sell defective product. This is my second item after first ine cracked. and this item do not have bottom cock. so unethical business.'

title: 'Water outlet cap missing'
body: 'Missing water outlet cap otherwise good one'

title: 'Water outlet closing lid missing'
body: Water outlet closing lid is missing inside package,now it's useless as water will flow continuously outside drying bucket section.bucket quality is good

title: 'Mess free... Comfortable usage'
body: 'Very comfortable to mop. Less effort and saves water. Does a neat job..'

title: 'Needs improvement'
body: The stick broke after few months of use. It seems it is better to purchase entire mop set rather than only purchasing the stick once it is broken. I don't feel this reduces mopping effort the way they are marketing it. Twin buckets also pretty much feel useless. Overall, the product fails to achieve its purpose of simplifying floor cleaning activity. They should rethink and make it better.

title: 'Handle and nob is not supplied in the box'
body: 'Incomplete supply and not replaced but replacement completed ani mail received but not responding our reviews'

title: 'Damage and missing refill'
body: 'Product damaged and quality not good as per ur online photo product and one refill only delivery as per show ur product provide 2 refills but incomplete product'

title: 'Not very efficient'
body: The mop's design, with separate buckets for clean and dirty water, requires frequent emptying of the dirty bucket, making it less efficient than a single-bucket mop
